Name: Beachcomber
Ingredients: 45 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
2.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix) optional
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Review: A Daiquiri with the addition of a dash of triple sec and maraschino.
History: Adapted from a recipe in Patrick Gavin Duffy's 1956 The Official Mixer's Manual .
Nutrition: One serving of Beachcomber contains 168 calories
